title: Did Kevin Spice's producer claim that Justin Bieber was "a drug and rapist "?
subtitle: Although Spicey was accused of sexual assault by multiple people, the allegation that he was "destroyed and raped" (Justin Bieber) is unfounded.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A film producer claimed that actor Kevin Spicey had been drugged and raped by Justin Bieber.
